steps.title: Spoon marmite into a mug - about two thirds of a teaspoon will be sufficient.
steps.content: Spoon marmite into a mug - about two thirds of a teaspoon will be sufficient. You can vary how much marmite you use depending on how much you can handle.

steps.title: Boil water in a kettle.
steps.content: Boil water in a kettle. Enough water to fill the mug.

steps.title: Pour the boiling water into the mug.
steps.content: Pour the boiling water into the mug.

steps.title: Stir the mixture until it becomes a light brown colour throughout.
steps.content: Stir the mixture until it becomes a light brown colour throughout.

steps.title: Wait for the broth to cool before drinking
steps.content: Wait for the broth to cool before drinking

steps.title: If you wish, dip buttered bread into your broth to turn it into a meal.
steps.content: If you wish, dip buttered bread into your broth to turn it into a meal.

steps.title: Insert all the ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice.
steps.content: Insert all the ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice.

steps.title: Strain the mixture into a 12oz Collins (without ice).
steps.content: Strain the mixture into a 12oz Collins (without ice).

steps.title: Garnish the cocktail with a celery stick and lemon wedge.
steps.content: Garnish the cocktail with a celery stick and lemon wedge.
